AI Description: RepeatMasker is a program that screens DNA sequences for interspersed repeats and low complexity DNA sequences. It can be used to identify repetitive elements, such as transposons and retroviruses, in genomic sequences.
Core Features: Identification Of Interspersed Repeats, Screening Of Low Complexity DNA Sequences, Detection Of Transposons & Retroviruses, Annotation & Masking Of Repetitive Elements
General Tags: Genomics, Bioinformatics, Sequence Analysis, Repeat Detection
